page.title: 13My Life Today 10 years
page.content: I am Edward and I am ten years old.I live in Henley and I have two younger brothers,James,who is nine and Robert, who is seven.Robert is in the Infant Class at Harpsden.My best hobby is tree climbing,JamesÂ£s is swimming and RobertÂ£s is drawing.We read a lot at home and we make technical Lego Models. We have two pets and we have bicycles. We also have two cars,a Vauxhall Cavalier and a Hillman Avenger.I live in 1985 and there are two Space Shuttles now.They are Columbia and Discovery.I have been in a jet plane four times.Last year we had a holiday in Malta.On Tuesday,I have a judo lesson,on Wednesday a piano lesson,on Thursday,Orchestra and Choir Practice, on Friday cubs,on Saturday homework,on Sunday Choir and on Monday - nothing! I play the violin and recorder at School. My Mother and Father work full - time.
